General.Name: Hunan Dajiaweikang Pharmaceutical Industry Co.Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Dajiaweikang Pharmaceutical Industry Co.,Ltd engages in the wholesale and retail of pharmaceuticals products in China. The company offers anabolic preparations and peptide hormones, second-class psychotropic drugs, vaccines, antibiotic raw materials, biological products, biochemical drugs, antibiotic preparations, Chinese medicine decoction pieces, chemical drug preparations, chemical raw materials, Chinese herbal medicine, Chinese patent medicines, and medical toxic drugs; medical devices; and health food products. It also offers pharmaceutical logistics services; and operates reproductive hospitals. The company was formerly known as Hunan Tongjian Pharmacy CO., LTD and changed its name to Hunan Dajiaweikang Pharmaceutical Industry Co.,Ltd in August 2016. Hunan Dajiaweikang Pharmaceutical Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is based in Changsha, China.
